title: "ESMO 2023: Application of Novel Machine Learning Model in 68Ga-PSMA-11 PET/CT – Predicting Survival in Oligometastatic Prostate Cancer Patients"
excerpt: "(UroToday.com) The 2023 ESMO annual meeting included a session on prostate cancer, featuring a presentation by Dr. Mikaela Dell'Oro discussing the application of novel machine learning model in 68 Ga-PSMA-11 PET/CT. Biochemical recurrence is estimated to occur in ≥ 25% of patients with prostate cancer following primary curative therapy."
